website_summaries.verdict: A versatile product that stands out for its strong hem cord.
pros: Available in two sizes to accommodate a variety of ATVs
Elastic hem cord along the bottom is designed to be used for trailering
cons: Some buyers complain that the cover is larger than expected

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: Great product that appears to be of quality. Strong elastic stretches and grips on tires to prevent wind from pulling it off. I will update this review if anything changes. 5/31/19 Had rain and definitely beads water up allowing it to roll off the cover. 2006 CanAm Bombardier Outlander 800 H/O
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ell

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good
customer_reviews.text: The cover looks good and fits my ATV really well. A week after I got the cover I had my ATV parked outside and it rained pretty good. The next morning water was beaded up on the outside of the cover, but the seat and other areas where the cover was in contact were damp, leading me to think the cover was more water repellant than waterproof. Since then I have built a small carport to park the ATV under so I may not get the chance to test it in direct rain any time soon. However, I'm sure it will protect it from snow and dust and anything else that blows in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover
customer_reviews.text: Good value for money. I use these more or less as dust covers while storing my machines in a barn. They are fast and easy to put on. I have not used it on my machine while pulling them on a trailer and would not think they are sufficiently strong to tolerate this for any length of time. Good value and works much better than a simple tarp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is big.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover for my 2014 Grizzly 550 which has a large trunk/seat on the back and a plow on the front. The cover actually fits loosely over the atv and large trunk This thing is big. It will actually fit over the entire atv and plow if the trunk is not on. Needless to say, I have had to go fetch it twice from the neighbors yard after a wind storm. I wish they had seen in Velcro strand to since it down with. Aside from that I am very pleased with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Fits ridihng mower
customer_reviews.text: This cover just fits my John Deere riding mower with collection bags attached. I have yet to find a "riding mower cover" that was big enough.
customer_reviews.author: reknirb

customer_reviews.title: So far I really like it with additions I sewed on.
customer_reviews.text: It's real big and it has elastic all the way around it. I just got it and it fit my 550 A Cat really nice covered the tires completely. My only suggestion would be to put a strap underneath in case of wind would get underneath of it and blow it off. so far I am very happy I'll let you know in one year if I still am. I sewed on a belly strap sode to side. It needs an end to end strap. It is very windy where I live. Pleased after my ad ons.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lovelady

customer_reviews.title: Fit of the cover on my ATV
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the way this cover fits my Kawasaki Brute Force 750. I had concerns when I made the purchase if the cover would fit my machine. It is a little bit of a pain to put on by myself there is a lot of back and forth front to back. But it fits very nice. I would recommend this for someone with the same Kawasaki Brute Force 750 ATV that I have. I received the cover two days after I ordered it which was an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Bradbury

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but not great
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so light and thin... But it somehow manages not to get destroyed in storms...? So I bought this to cover my quad that has exention baskets I use for hunting n loading deer. This was the only one I found long enough to cover my quad. Points for that. The draw backs are that there are no tie straps in it and that its so thin it sometimes wants to fly off in the rain... But still, does the job just don't feel its worth the asking price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W

customer_reviews.title: After about two months in the sun
customer_reviews.text: Over all like this cover. Got it because I wanted it to cover my two 4wheelers both 400s and didn’t want to break the bank.I think it does that very well I have had this cover on the bikes for a little under two months. Keep in mind I live in sunny California and it’s summertime Well I wouldn’t say this is the best over out there I didn’t wanna spend an arm and a leg like I mentioned and I am happy and it definitely covers one bike no problem but will cover two. There is some fading but that’s normal especially for such a cheap cover That’s out in the sun all day. Hope it helps
customer_reviews.author: Armando. C

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy. You won’t be happy
customer_reviews.text: Elastic is only on the ends. Not a good deal It is larger than anticipated. But that’s ok Would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Best ATV cover for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these covers in the spring. They have held up great considering the have been used most of the year to cover my ATV’s I keep at a cabin. They have not faded in the sun and they keep the seats dry in foul weather. The size of the covers are great. I have one on a Honda Rancher and another for my Polaris touring ATV. Big difference in size of ATVs but the covers fit both nicely. I have purchased similar covers in the past, but these have held up the best. I recommend purchasing these covers. Best value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Skewed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ATV Cover
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what I expected, but this was a pleasant surprise. Wasn’t very expensive, so I figured it would do the job for awhile. Found it to be well made and material seems durable. Fits my Polaris 850 perfectly. I keep my ATV garaged, but wanted this when that wasn’t possible (camping etc. ). It goes on easy and folds up/stores well. Happy purchase.
customer_reviews.author: j rocket

customer_reviews.title: Basically an indoor dust cover. Wont survive any natural elements.
customer_reviews.text: Might be waterproof but NOT wind or sun proof. Bought 2 in June and both are shredded by November. We even had extra straps over the center, connected to footpegs. You get what you pay for. Basically in indoor dust cover. Back to tarps for the winter...NOT happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cover at great price. Easily fits Raptor 660 and 700
customer_reviews.text: Very light, maby too light for windy situations but I was in the desert for 7 weeks and turned them inside out so that the aluminum color was on the outside and the black color on the inside. thought this might protect better and has the covers last longer. All in all for the money great buy. If you want super durable , heavy and better for high winds , get one of the heavy duty ecspensive ones. I have those too but like to use these ones when i can
customer_reviews.author: Dolfje

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Description
customer_reviews.text: The description said Large, but they sent me a XXX Large!!! Waaaaay too big for my quad. But I ordered it in July and it’s November and I just now went to open it for the first time and realized this. It happened last time I ordered one too. Too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: MW17

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Is more than big enough to cover my new ATV. Material feels like it is going to last for several years. The elastic along the bottom holds it snug along the bottom. Well made and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff H

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for cub Cadet lawnmower
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my cub cadet zero turn lawnmower with the twin blades. I couldn’t find a Lawnmower cover the right size to fit my cub cadet. I checked the measurements and it fit perfect. It is a lightweight cover and it covers from top all the way down past the tires. This is great cover for summer as it is lightweight. I will probably put a heavy cover on top of this for the winter when I am not using my mower
customer_reviews.author: Viperwife

customer_reviews.title: Very nice ATV cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover is lightweight and keeps the sun from ruining my atv. I live out in the desert so this cover will help my atv from being destroyed in the hot sun. I like that it folds up small too. It's very large and fits over my Suzuki LTR450 with room to spare. Even covers all the way to the ground front to back, side to side.
customer_reviews.author: Sterling L. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Super deal. It is very large, and covers all of my accessories (windshield, winch, large cargo box). It's held up well in Montana's wind and snow. It's easy to put on, because the elastic doesn't go clear around the bottom. The two sections of elastic on the front and back hold it well. But I use a long bungee over the top if big winds are expected. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Monte A.

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.  All I need.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice moderately light weight 4 wheeler cover. I have a 2008 Polaris 500HO with an aftermarket tub on the back. This cover is way large enough to cover it all and them some. I have not nor will I use it during transit. It doesn't secure that well although it has handled a couple pretty good wind storms. It doesn't leak. Keeps all the weather off, which was nice for those dew covered hunting mornings! I haven't seen firsthand the winter snow performance, but for now, it is a great little purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Wardman

customer_reviews.title: Nice atv cover. Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Nice atv cover. Fits my Honda rancher just fine. Even with utility box on rear rack the cover fits fine. Cover held up well in wind and snow.
customer_reviews.author: tresa

customer_reviews.title: Best for hiding small cows.
customer_reviews.text: I mean sure I ordered it for my 4-wheeler but you really need to hide a small farm animal. This is the item you need. Sure its' a little weird and they bump into things a lot. But ... alright, enough joking around. It's fine. Works just fine and so far it's been good. No UV damage yet. And the rain runs off. Everything you'd want.
customer_reviews.author: J. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Overall I like it
customer_reviews.text: Overall I’m happy with this cover. It’s lasted in the crazy wind I have at my house and has not torn at all. I’ve had this for about 6 months now, it seems to keep dry underneath it. My one and only complaint is there is no straps to attach it to my quad. That would be fine if I didn’t have the obnoxious wind at my place. I just wrapped a long bungee cord around it so it wouldn’t blow away. It does have an elastic edge so it stays snug in normal wind.
customer_reviews.author: Dustyram

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: These fit a Honda Rubicon nicely. Put the same one on a Foreman and was a tad long. Tied left over length in small knot...fits good now. For price and quality, feel they will be around for a while. Mostly used to keep bird droppings and dust off the 4 wheelers in a barn.
customer_reviews.author: MPD

customer_reviews.title: Sun bleaches the cover
customer_reviews.text: Rainproof, yes. Protect from sun? Yes, so far, but the cover is becoming bleached and I'm hoping they will hold up and not start tearing. We live in Arizona so the summer has been brutal at 116 degree temps for the last week. I can give an update in a few more months.
customer_reviews.author: C. Huffaker

customer_reviews.title: Weak bands on cover
customer_reviews.text: Extremely light which I liked but the rubber bands on the bottom are vvery weak and dont hold well. I would not recommend this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and Durable
customer_reviews.text: We use these to cover outdoor kitchen and bar and tables we have at the lake! I’ve ordered several of them and they have lasted for years with no tears or problems. Very durable and so useful to cover more than a 4 wheeler.
customer_reviews.author: Sherron Lavender Ponder

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: It's not a super heavy duty cover but it's easy to wrap around my 4 wheeler and so far no rips after taking off and putting back on more then a dozen them. It is not waterproof but keep the baking sun from fading seat and carry bag.
customer_reviews.author: Heriberto Garcia Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality cover for storing off road toys outside and still protected!
customer_reviews.text: This cover is worth the money! It fits perfect for both my lawn tractor and 4 wheeler. The material is lightweight and durable but able to withstand the high winds in a wisconsin blizzard once secured! It has not only stayed in place in weather that twisted highway signs but was also undamaged. For the price I'm impressed with the quality. The only thing I'd change is additional straps on certain areas to give it a tighter fit to the equipment it's on, adjustable ones would be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Geiser

customer_reviews.title: Good for basic protection
customer_reviews.text: Good cover for basic protection. Goes on easy. I found that if snow is allowed to sit on it and melts, it will begin to leak. Will buy a better quality cover in the future, but this works for now.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Denk

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight cover for atv, which you may want to order in a larger size than stated
customer_reviews.text: The cover is lightweight and easy to put onto Artic Cat ATV. The only complaint I have is that it is a bit smaller than what I thought, and doesn't cover entire vehicle like it should.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Luv my cover
customer_reviews.text: I was Surprised by what Good Quality for the money this cover for my four wheeler was I do lots of price checking research and this is by far the best price and the best quality I was surprised how good it was
customer_reviews.author: talene harvel

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: The cover is so flimsy that it won’t protect the atv in the elements
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: At cover
customer_reviews.text: Great cover for the price I was impressed by this cover nice and light and does the job with the dust has elastic at the bottom just put it below they tires so the breeze doesn’t blow it off
customer_reviews.author: Carrie L. Carrillo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Keep in mind they are really big. I have a Honda 450 and it completely covers it, with extra . I put a strap around it to secure it. Good quality and just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: DD22

customer_reviews.title: Helped this momma out!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to cover my sons jeep. It was way too big obviously being that it’s meant for a four wheeler. I ended up sewing it to fit his car. What I love about it is it held up amazingly. I am not a pro at sewing and had to cut and alter but the fabric held up. I’m assuming if after me taking scissors to it and messing around with it and it still holds up it’ll definitely do the job left alone. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: 4X4 cover
customer_reviews.text: The cover is thinner than I expected. It's bigger than my 2019 Polaris 450 so it covers it easily. It leaks along the main seam getting the electronics wet. This cover is not waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Chas.7

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This cover fit perfectly over my Honda Foreman. When I've struggled with covers over every other item in my barn it was nice to purchase a cover that was light and fit without pulling and tugging and trying to figure out if I had it on wrong. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: The only back draw I have is that it need a string or something else to tight at the bottom. It is a universal product that fits to many models but if not tight at the bottom winds picks it up and exposes the machine
customer_reviews.author: Lg

customer_reviews.title: Not the most durable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this cover after a different brand cover lasted only 6 months in the weather. This and the old cover are nearly identical, so I don't expect this material to hold up very much longer than 6 months. This cover might be suitable for storage in a barn or shed, not in the direct weather.
customer_reviews.author: John Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Good Cover
customer_reviews.text: This is not super light or easily torn. Its a heavy duty cover and does the job of covering my kids 4wheeler with ease. It has a tightening pull cord to keep it tied down. Keeps water and snow off the quad.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S

customer_reviews.title: As  describe  👍👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Nice material, fits perfect, Fits over my Honda Rancher 420 like a dream.. I’d buy this item again if needed.. light weight but durable .. 👍👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EASY ON...EASY OFF!
customer_reviews.text: The elastics on the front and back make it easy to slip on and off without having to mess with any ropes or tie downs to secure it on my bike. Feels like high quality material.....time will tell but i really like it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Da Wolf Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Best cover I have had
customer_reviews.text: I have had other covers that were suppose to be waterproof but this cover is the best I have had. Very large cover and there was no water pooling on the top after the storm. Really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Jo-Anne

customer_reviews.title: How long it last !
customer_reviews.text: I put a rear basket on my 4wheeler and the normal cover won't fit. So I ordered the xtra large cover which adequately fits, but is loose on the bottom
customer_reviews.author: William J Connor

customer_reviews.title: Toughness
customer_reviews.text: This is the best ATV cover i have bought. It took me 3 other inferior covers until this one. Does not blow off !! Rain repels right off !! Great cover and super fast shipping !!
customer_reviews.author: Brian B.

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: Nice cover and fit to my Kawasaki 4 wheeler. Keeps the rain off of it when I don’t put the 4 wheeler away in the garage. Great cover for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ho

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I use this on a 2008 full size King Quad, and it fits very well. It's a little baggy/loose on top, but the elastic bands on the front and back fit low across the tires for a snug enough fit. It hasn't blow off yet.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Just what he wanted
customer_reviews.text: My hubby is pleased with this item. fits well and works well. Delivery route was too long and round about. Shipper gave it the scenic route of the USA before getting it to our doorstep.
customer_reviews.author: mary huntington

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value. It’s easy to use, protects my 420 cc ATV, and fits easily over the whole thing -even with a snorkel and raised radiator.
customer_reviews.author: andro

customer_reviews.title: Price is good fitzwell ship's punctually
customer_reviews.text: Set the four-wheelers perfectly and took care of the fact that when I put a tarp on it it blows off. This is perfect. Price is good too
customer_reviews.author: Stephen S

customer_reviews.title: Product doesn't match description
customer_reviews.text: I bought this "large" cover for my raptor. When the package came in the product say XXXL. This thing is big enough to cover a can-am maverick. The cover even fits very loosely over my Kawasaki brute force. Very unhappy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: These were easy to install and work well. I like how they slip over the curvature of the tire. They are cheap, but the material quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: DRAKS

customer_reviews.title: Super tough and waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 2004 Kawasaki Kfx700 great and feels really tough. Totally waterproof after a really hard rain and protected atv from dust and leaves. Going to get a smaller size for my riding mower next.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Cummins

customer_reviews.title: Real nice product at a real nice price
customer_reviews.text: Fits good on a big frame 4 wheeler (polaris sportsman 600) and is heavy enough material that it should last a long time. I'm just using it as a cover in a barn to keep dust, dirt and potential moisture off of it. Fits my needs perfect,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy
customer_reviews.text: The material seems thin .. but it did fit perfectly on our quad .. Walmart wanted 80$ so am very happy with the price
customer_reviews.author: sharon cushey

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great for the price! I will say it’s not completely water proof in a down pour but it does repel some water. Overall I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Trey casper

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased a Yamaha Grizzly 660 and it will be sitting outdoors for awhile. Found this cover and it fit great. Completely covers the quad head to toe. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: CARL S MOORE

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad as a late christmas gift. He went right out to his ATV and put it on. It fit well and seems sturdy, he loved it
customer_reviews.author: A. Dillinger

customer_reviews.title: seem better than my old mad dog cover
customer_reviews.text: IK like it been through several storms now in summer in so fla the smaller one covers my rancher just fine
customer_reviews.author: Mike in Miami

customer_reviews.title: Very large size
customer_reviews.text: Just put it on my 4 wheeler today so I'm unsure of it's durability. Definitely lightweight and plenty big enough for even the biggest ATV. Appears to be waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Jean acker

customer_reviews.title: A good product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This product fit my Polaris 500 well. The drawback was the elastic didn’t stay underneath and there’s no fasteners attached.
customer_reviews.author: Elise C.

customer_reviews.title: Not great but cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Only Has elastics front and back. Doesn’t hold well in the wind. I got the XL and it’s way too big. I have a Yamaha grizzly 700 should have gotten the large.
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good value
customer_reviews.text: Can't complain too much. Serves the purpose of keeping my atv out of the sun until I can rebuild the carport
customer_reviews.author: Shelby M.

customer_reviews.title: Good size cover
customer_reviews.text: Fits over a 54" Hustler zero turn and 48" Lesco walk behind great. Extra carry bag that comes with cover is nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: x

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly. Lightweight/thin, but it's doing the job of keeping it covered & dry.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: It way to big but it better than what I had before only wish it had vin or model input device and will tell you if it fits or not.
customer_reviews.author: airplane312

customer_reviews.title: Cut way too BIG/poor fabric quality
customer_reviews.text: I was sent a XXXL cover for my TRX400 which is far too big. Since the cover is too large it hangs on the floor, collecting dirt and water. I have used the cover for less than 2 months and the top portion already faded to a dull grey. So disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Works ok
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work ok except when it rained and water sat on it, eventually soaked threw
customer_reviews.author: Adam.

customer_reviews.title: Repels water.
customer_reviews.text: Can't comment on durability over time yet but so far so good. The price was right for me.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie L.

customer_reviews.title: inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Cover blew off during first storm. Wasn't what i expected for "heavy duty"
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: Works but thin
customer_reviews.text: My wheeler is lifted so it doesn’t cover all of it. Plus the cover is thin.
customer_reviews.author: firegator26

customer_reviews.title: Rather large
customer_reviews.text: Its really big. They say it fits a 700 raptor... and it does.... but its fit is loose.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Secure tape to atv
customer_reviews.text: Super lightweight tarp, definitely need to secure it to atv or will blow off.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Very large - will fly away if not tied down
customer_reviews.text: The large one is VERY LARGE. Mine flew away twice so I tied it down and yesterday still managed to fly away and it drifted over 1/4 mile. It’s destroyed so make sure if you have a regular quad -250, 350, etc get the smaller one!
customer_reviews.author: chris kwoka

customer_reviews.title: worked out great
customer_reviews.text: there is nothing we have negative to write about this product, came as told it would and performs as it states online
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves it. Easy to put on and remove. Does the job and the price was good.
customer_reviews.author: pinkzoo

customer_reviews.title: Experience it for one time and you'll buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Now I can sweep my snow without having to sweep my bike I take the cover off and I'm ready to go I've had my bike for 6 years and it has been a hassle to clean my bike first and then sweep my snow I have a plow on my four-wheeler and now just take it off and start plowing I love it very much
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall it does the trick
customer_reviews.text: I used it for my suzuki 400 fits a bit big but its covers it well
customer_reviews.author: Ramon

customer_reviews.title: 4 Wheeler Cover
customer_reviews.text: Love this item ! I was actually surprised at the durability of the material - considering the price. Pleasantly surprised !
customer_reviews.author: Wesley's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good cover for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2004 Polaris Magnum 330 4x4 and its a perfect fit down to the bottom of the tires! My quad is kept in a garage so i cant speak on the durability of the material exposed to the elements, but it seems to be a good material for the price. Not a cheaper plastic cover that would tear easy.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Selepack

customer_reviews.title: Thin but works!
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a thicker cover but for what it is it works!
customer_reviews.author: Rufus M. Arroyo

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: It got here extremely fast with free shipping! Great material, well packaged and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Covers my ATV completely
customer_reviews.text: Covers my Arctic Cat 700 ATV completely & is holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: We keep our ATV in our garage but our dogs like to get on it. Does the job to keep them off and it clean from fur.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: Got for my polaris sportman 550. Nice big size. Elastic bands. Seems to work well
customer_reviews.author: L.E.O

customer_reviews.title: ATV covers
customer_reviews.text: was surprised that the covers actually fit our 2 up machines that being said the covers have blown off multiple times even with wind speeds under 10 mph. so we have had to tie them down. have not had them long so will see how long they last. bought these to save our more expensive covers that you can use when traveling
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: substandard material for ATV cover application
customer_reviews.text: Outside in Southern Oregon for 12 months and shows stress damage to fabric caused by sun. I expect this product to last a few years in sun before coming apart. Product is shot at 1 year and needs to be replaced. This product is a waste of valuble resources and is not worth the supply chain that brought it to me and will destroy it shortly.
customer_reviews.author: t d c

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It took only two days and my cover was here. It fits perfect on my 750 and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Al Madding

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Cover is advertised as a trailering cover. Not true first time trailering it ripped to shreds and also very light weight
customer_reviews.author: shooter

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. We just put it on today. Fit perfectly! So far very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes good care of our Can-Am
customer_reviews.text: This is not that light weight! I actually like the weight that it has. It’s not a cheap material. It’s very well made. We put this on our Can-Am and it fully covers it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Manzano

customer_reviews.title: length
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a large quad and it fit like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: gerri

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2 Person Golf Cart without a roof PERFECT!!
customer_reviews.text: After much research and calling golf cart stores, no one carries a golf cart cover that fits a two person cart without a roof. Found this one and it fits great so I would definitely add that to your "search notes" to direct people to it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good cover. Looks like it will last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Bill03

customer_reviews.title: large size
customer_reviews.text: This cover is plenty big for my 800 Polaris Sportsman and appears to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Gary J. Kraudelt

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: This is actually pretty nice for a low-cost atv cover, way better than the snowmobile cover I bought last year on Amazon..
customer_reviews.author: Lance G.

customer_reviews.title: The perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for our ATV. Does an excellent job of protecting it from the outside elements.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Fillman

customer_reviews.title: Wont last!
customer_reviews.text: Didnt even last 1 year, ordered march 2019, disintegrated by December 2019. Faded quickly and torn with slight wind.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this cover. Fits well, looks good, and keeps the weather off.
customer_reviews.author: rr

product_meta.title: Indeedbuy Waterproof ATV Cover,Large Heavy Duty Black Protects 4 Wheeler From Snow Rain or Sun,102'' x44'' x 48''
product_meta.description:
Size:102'' x44'' x 48''Indeedbuy ATV COVERS are the number one choice for your quad! Our high quality fabric guarantees longevity in all weather.

Dirt and mud that covers your 4 wheeler after a long day of off-road fun can easily be sprayed off with water. The real damage is what happens to your quad while you store and transport it.

look the images above for your SOLUTION to protecting your ATV from nature’s harm!

ONE SIZE FITS MOST - 102” x 44” x 48” fits most Honda, Yamaha, Polaris, Suzuki, Kawasaki,Such as Suzuki 400 eiger,Honda foreman,Honda rancher,Polaris Sportsman,Polaris Sportsman 570,Trailerable,Rhino, Drawstring,Quad gear,with Windshield, Can-Am and Arctic Cat models of ATVs!

Includes a FREE storage bag to carry your cover when you are out on your adventures!

We know how important the quality is to you ,just rest assured,if any dissatisfaction occurred on Indeedbuy ATV cover,you are always welcomed to contact us for exchange or refund without sending back your ATV Cover,neither ANY QUESTION ASK!
